idea:
SPARK.loans is a TECHNOLOGY PLATFORM enabling digital lending against securities.

Its a unique business model wherein any asset (shares, mutual funds, bonds, debentures, Life Insurance policies, gold deposit bonds) which is in demat / electronic form can be pledged as a security for obtaining loan from our bank partners through the SPARK platform.

Loan against securities is otherwise a cumbersome process, mostly involving physical documentation and a lengthy process. Our platform makes this process hassle free and provides the best user experience to the customer. The core engine of the platform which is an application software, uses advanced technologies including Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence. We wish to create a niche for ourselves in this space and play our part in development of digital India.
name: SPARK FINANCIAL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Mombay has been established with the aim of changing traditional shopping behaviour of browsing through multiple stores and products to select one. 

We use customer data and machine learning to establish the need, preference and budget of the customer and then recommend products to them using curated boxes for homeware products.


For the customers, we are a home styling service without the hassle and cost of interior decorators and traditional retail. 

For our suppliers, we are great platform for brand discovery by the right customer segment.

For the environment, we are a sustainable option as we make what our customers want.

We are the next generation of retail.
name: MOMBAY RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We at D. N. ECO are committed to recycling plastic waste by leveraging our

technology into useful new products which are then used to improve the standard of living of the people.


Our primary objective at D.N. ECO is to work towards solving plastic and industrial waste issue by recycling it into new innovative products such as Modular House, Paver Tiles, Benches, Roof Tiles, Fences/Poles, and Pallets. 


Our Vision is to shift to a plastic-waste free India by practicing Circular Economy.
name: D. N. ECO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Start Up Intro



Through the years I have observed a gap in our society, at one end we have those who want to learn and explore art forms but are unable to do it due to their busy lives, economic status, lose interest due to lack of proper progression in learning or non-availability of an ecosystem to meet talented artists and at the other end there are these hidden diamonds in our cities, towns and villages who have the greatest treasures to offer but are not able to reach their students, are not able to market their content or are not able to find a platform to showcase their Magnum Opus. This abyss between the two ends had to be filled… and this is how Be Artistic was born. The venture aims to bridge the gap as we start laying the veritable bricks of creating a platform where the artist inside and outside you will be much closer than they are now. Starting from Art tech this application can be scaled to be inclusive of numerous other avenues. 


Apps key functionality

• Be Artistic through a single app would help you learn sketching, painting, calligraphy and various other forms of art by step by step easy to learn tutorials.

• As currently there is no Indian mainstream = app available for people interested in art, where users on a single platform can learn so many different forms of art

• These art forms are selected in a way to keep in line with the subjects taught in art schools

• It will also have an option to study the theory of art, as it is important to understand the origin, history and the influence that art form had on this world, which will widen the knowledge of the user


Revenue Model

• In app advertising

• Subscription services

• In app purchases


Why would people like to use it?

• As it will save time, save search effort which usually shortens the actual time of practice, progressive learning, know the history and artists behind what they are learning

• All tutorials would be sequenced in such a way, that it would make learning easy and simple. Building a smooth road for a non tech savvy artist, as everything would be available on just one click

• It will help in building a community for artists, as there would be various activities like competitions, exhibitions conducted and hence art lovers from hook and corner of the country would be able to showcase their creativity, which will also help in promoting smaller artist

• It will also serve as a platform for the talented artists of our country to share their knowledge and skills to a wider audience, covering pan India


Audience Benefit

• Users will learn to draw and paint using different mediums, through various tutorials sitting right at home, which would add value to people who want to learn but don’t know how and where to start from and don’t have time to join classes.

• It will be a cost-effective learning, and hence even the ones who can’t afford drawing classes will be able to master the art form they always wanted to

• Makes sense in the post covid world where people will spend more time home and need something to inspire themselves.
name: Be Artistic

idea:
SalesClap is a powerful cloud based software-as-a-service (SaaS) CRM provider for Real Estate industry in India. It is SaaS CRM tool that makes sales predictable. It stores customers information like names, addresses, email, phone numbers etc… as well as keeps track of your sales activities, it's the definitive tool for scaling businesses.

It is running entirely on air so there is no expensive setup cost and it is maintenance-free. Your employees can operate this from anywhere or from any device with an internet connection, you just need to login and start using this software application and manage your customers as simple as that.
name: SalesClap.com
